mapper.update: INSERT INTO notice_board (notice_no, title, content, hit, admin_id, w_date) VALUES( #{noticeno }, #{title }, #{content }, #{hit }, #{writer }, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select t1.*, like_cnt from (select n.notice_no, title, content, hit, admin_id, w_date, nfile_no, originname, storedname from notice_board n left join notice_file f on n.notice_no = f.notice_no where n.notice_no = ${noticeno }) t1 left outer join (select count(user_id) as like_cnt,notice_no from notice_like group by notice_no having notice_no = ${noticeno })t2 on t1.notice_no = t2.notice_no

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, n.* FROM ( select t1.*, storedname, originname, cnt_comment from ( SELECT notice_no, title, content , admin_id, hit, w_date FROM notice_board ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) t1 left outer join ( select a.notice_no, a.storedname, b.originname from ( select notice_no, max(storedname) as storedname from notice_file group by notice_no) a left outer join notice_file b on a.storedname = b.storedname) t2 on t1.notice_no = t2.notice_no left outer join (select notice_no, count(notice_no) as cnt_comment from notie_comment group by notice_no) t3 on t1.notice_no = t3.notice_no order by t1.notice_no desc ) n ) notice_board WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
SELECT count(*) FROM notice_board WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, n.* FROM ( select t1.*, storedname, originname, cnt_comment from ( SELECT notice_no, title, content , admin_id, hit, w_date FROM notice_board ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) t1 left outer join ( select a.notice_no, a.storedname, b.originname from ( select notice_no, max(storedname) as storedname from notice_file group by notice_no) a left outer join notice_file b on a.storedname = b.storedname) t2 on t1.notice_no = t2.notice_no left outer join (select notice_no, count(notice_no) as cnt_comment from notie_comment group by notice_no) t3 on t1.notice_no = t3.notice_no WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%' order by t1.notice_no desc ) n ) notice_board WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{paging.startNo } AND #{paging.endNo }
